dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description: ExtUtils::Config - A wrapper for perl's configuration
dependencies.name: perl-extutils-config

dependencies.description: ExtUtils::Helpers - Various portability utilities for module builders
dependencies.name: perl-extutils-helpers

dependencies.description: ExtUtils::InstallPaths - Build.PL install path logic made easy
dependencies.name: perl-extutils-installpaths

dependencies.description:
Module::Build is a system for building, testing, and installing Perl
modules. It is meant to be an alternative to ExtUtils::MakeMaker.
Developers may alter the behavior of the module through subclassing in a
much more straightforward way than with MakeMaker. It also does not
require a make on your system - most of the Module::Build code is pure-
perl and written in a very cross-platform way.
dependencies.name: perl-module-build

dependent_to.description: Compile a log format string to perl-code
dependent_to.name: perl-apache-logformat-compiler

dependent_to.description: Convert Oracle NLS_DATE_FORMAT <-> strftime Format Strings
dependent_to.name: perl-convert-nls-date-format

dependent_to.description: Parse and format PostgreSQL dates and times
dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-format-pg

dependent_to.description: A Moose role for processing command line options
dependent_to.name: perl-moosex-getopt

dependent_to.description: GNU C library compatible strftime for loggers and servers
dependent_to.name: perl-posix-strftime-compiler

dependent_to.description: Readonly - Facility for creating read-only scalars, arrays, hashes
dependent_to.name: perl-readonly

dependent_to.description: Drop-in replacement for Test::Time to work with Time::HiRes
dependent_to.name: perl-test-time-hires

description: Module::Build::Tiny - A tiny replacement for Module::Build
name: perl-module-build-tiny

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
